mapper.select: SELECT clint_seq , clint_nme , clint_mangr , clint_mangr_num , CONCAT ('(',clint_bank_acout,') ', clint_acout_num) AS clint_acout_num , clint_surtax_check FROM clint_tb WHERE ${clintListSelectBox} LIKE '%${clintListSearchText}%' ORDER BY clint_seq desc LIMIT ${recordCountPerPage} OFFSET ${firstRecordIndex};

SELECT clint_seq , clint_nme , clint_represntatv , clint_mangr , clint_num , clint_mangr_num , clint_fax , clint_bank_acout , clint_acout_num , clint_surtax_check , clint_postcd , clint_adrs , clint_detl FROM clint_tb WHERE clint_seq = #{clintSeq};

SELECT p.prodct_seq , p.main_img , p.prodct_nme , p.catgr_seq , c1.rot_catgr_seq , c2.rot_catgr_seq
FROM prodct_tb p LEFT JOIN clint_bridg_tb c ON p.prodct_seq = c.prodct_seq JOIN catgr_tb c1 ON p.catgr_seq = c1.catgr_seq JOIN catgr_tb c2 ON c1.rot_catgr_seq = c2.catgr_seq WHERE c.prodct_seq IS NULL AND p.prodct_seq NOT IN (SELECT prodct_seq FROM prodct_clint_tb)
AND p.prodct_nme LIKE '%${prodctSechText}%'
AND (p.catgr_seq = #{catgrSeq} OR c1.rot_catgr_seq = #{catgrSeq} OR c2.rot_catgr_seq = #{catgrSeq})
ORDER BY p.prodct_nme LIMIT ${recordCountPerPage} OFFSET ${firstRecordIndex};

SELECT count(*) FROM prodct_tb p LEFT JOIN clint_bridg_tb c ON p.prodct_seq = c.prodct_seq JOIN catgr_tb c1 ON p.catgr_seq = c1.catgr_seq JOIN catgr_tb c2 ON c1.rot_catgr_seq = c2.catgr_seq WHERE c.prodct_seq IS NULL AND p.prodct_seq NOT IN (SELECT prodct_seq FROM prodct_clint_tb)
AND p.prodct_nme LIKE '%${prodctSechText}%'
AND (p.catgr_seq = #{catgrSeq} OR c1.rot_catgr_seq = #{catgrSeq} OR c2.rot_catgr_seq = #{catgrSeq})

SELECT count(*) FROM prodct_emp_tb pe JOIN prodct_tb p ON pe.prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq WHERE pe.type = 'c'
AND p.prodct_nme LIKE '%${tempSechText}%' ;

SELECT p.prodct_seq , p.main_img , p.prodct_nme , s.qunt , p.purchs_pric , p.sel_pric , p.disply_check , c.clint_bridg_seq FROM clint_bridg_tb c LEFT JOIN prodct_tb p ON c.prodct_seq = p.prodct_seq LEFT JOIN stck_tb s ON p.prodct_seq = s.prodct_seq WHERE c.clint_seq = ${clintSeq} ORDER BY p.disply_check desc, s.qunt asc LIMIT ${recordCountPerPage} OFFSET ${firstRecordIndex};
